title: Simulation/VR-Based Computer Education Course Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer operation skills and fundamental knowledge in specialized fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Practice-centered education utilizing VR simulations in smartphone-dominant limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can describe the basic components of computer systems with 80% accuracy in simulation/VR environments
Learners can independently perform algorithm design processes at over 70% proficiency through VR-based problem-solving scenarios
Learners can implement simple programming tasks with a 90% completion rate using smartphone-based tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
